EmailTemplate.description: This is used when a Telapoint Oppty is Closed Won
EmailTemplate.name: Telapoint Closed Won
EmailTemplate.subject: Telapoint Opportunity Won!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Drew,
Opportunity {!Opportunity.Name} owned by {!Opportunity.OwnerFullName} has been changed to {!Opportunity.StageName} Thanks WEX Salesforce Integration
Thanks
WEX Salesforce Integration
